code: @Before public void setUp() throws Exception {     Properties properties = new Properties().     properties.setProperty(Context.INITIAL_CONTEXT_FACTORY, "org.apache.openejb.client.LocalInitialContextFactory").     initialContext = new InitialContext(properties). }

@Test public void testGreaterViaLocalInterface() throws Exception {     Object object = initialContext.lookup("GreaterImplLocal").     assertNotNull(object).     assertTrue(object instanceof GreaterLocal).     GreaterLocal greater = (GreaterLocal) object.     assertEquals("Hello World", greater.hello("World")). }
